definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
Hongqiao, the name of numerous entities, notably a major airport in Shanghai, and a district in Tianjin
Huang Binhong (1865-1955), art historian and literati painter
spirit reaches to the rainbow/full of noble aspiration and daring

sentences.english: The first time in my life I saw a complete half-circle rainbow.
sentences.chinese: 第一次看到了传说中的霓和虹同时悬挂在天空的奇景。

sentences.english: The rainbow should also cause us to realise that God will not continually tolerate wickedness and ungodliness upon the earth.
sentences.chinese: 虹也使我们的意识到神不会无止境地容忍地上的罪恶。

sentences.english: Process of making lustre glaze by metal oxide as colouring agent was narrated.
sentences.chinese: 叙述了以金属氧化物为着色剂的虹彩釉的制作过程。

sentences.english: They disappeared into the haze of the sun like a shining silver ribbon.
sentences.chinese: 然后消失到太阳的虹光中，像一条闪亮银带。

sentences.english: There are recumbent water bridge, just like a colorful rainbow.
sentences.chinese: 还有横卧水上的小桥，宛若一道五彩的虹。

sentences.english: I do set my bow in the cloud， and it shall be for a token of a covenant between me and the earth.
sentences.chinese: 我把虹放在云彩中，这就可作我与地立约的记号了。

sentences.english: The author probes into the marriage love of the three generations of the Brangwen family in The Rainbow.
sentences.chinese: 文章阐述了《虹》中布郎温家族三代人的婚姻之爱。

sentences.english: They also have a specialized siphon jet under its mantle, that expels water and propels them as well.
sentences.chinese: 披风状的身体下方还有特别的虹管，也可喷水助游。

sentences.english: When the sun shines through a light rain, it makes a rainbow.
sentences.chinese: 当太阳的光线穿过小雨时便形成了虹。

sentences.english: In 2006, Shanghai Hailian Real Estate Co.
sentences.chinese: 2006年，上海海联置业有限公司租赁了虹庙。

sentences.english: XingTai City HongFei Bicycle Industry Co.
sentences.chinese: 邢台市虹飞车业有限公司。

sentences.english: I have set my rainbow in the clouds, and it will be the sign of the covenant between me and the earth.
sentences.chinese: 我把虹放在云彩中，这就可作我与地立约的记号了。

sentences.english: A rainbow has shown every color contains only a wavelength of light.
sentences.chinese: 一个虹所表现的每个颜色只包含一个波长的光。

sentences.english: Which is shattered to pieces floating among the alga
sentences.chinese: 是天上虹揉碎在浮藻间，沉淀着彩虹似的梦。

sentences.english: That is the rainbow which picks from the rising sun, nobody does not love your color.
sentences.chinese: 那是从旭日上采下的虹，没有人不爱你的色彩。

sentences.english: In 2006, Shanghai Hailian Real Estate Co. Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 2006年，上海海联置业有限公司租赁了虹庙。

definition: to approach/to rise high/thick ice/to insult or maltreat
phonetic fei or fi/elegant/phi (Greek letter Φ, φ)
Joseph Joffre (1852-1931), leading French general at the start of World War One
sail/Taiwan pr. [fan2], except 帆布[fan1 bu4] canvas
